topic: AI Integration - GPT, Claude, Mistral, Ollama
summary: GPT-4 (OpenAI), Claude (Anthropic), Mistral (open), Llama (Meta) support Model Context Protocol for tool integration.
details: GPT-4: closed-source, multimodal, advanced reasoning. Claude: advanced technical reasoning, artifacts, developer-oriented, MCP native. Mistral: efficient, open, strong code generation. Llama: open-source, accessible for smaller orgs. Model Context Protocol (MCP): open standard by Anthropic for connecting LLMs to tools/services. ChatGPT adds MCP alongside proprietary Actions. HyperCode can integrate via MCP for universal AI compatibility without costly rewrites.
